instructions:
Melt butter in a 1 quart sauce pan; add brown sugar; boil over low heat 2 minutes stirring all the time.
Add milk and keep stirring until mixture boils. Remove from heat and cool. Add vanilla. Add 1/2 cup
confectioner's sugar at a time beating well after each addition. Continue adding sugar until thick enough to
spread. Enough to frost an 8 or 9 inch layer cake or a 9 by 13-inch pancake.

COCONUT BROILED FROSTING
4 tbsp margarine, melted
5 tbsp evaporated milk
1/3 cup firmly packed brown sugar
1/2 cup shredded coconut

Combine above ingredients and spread on the warm cake. Do not remove cake from the pan. Place the
cake about 6 inches from broiler and broil for about 6 minutes or until icing bubbles and is golden brown.
Enough for a 9x13 inch cake.
name: Frostings Ii
